defaultProfiles.description: I am a Professor of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii, Director of the Collaborative Software Development Laboratory, and the CEO of OpenPowerQuality.com.
I am a Professor of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii, Director of the Collaborative Software Development Laboratory, and the CEO of OpenPowerQuality.com.

defaultVendors.name: The Bean Counter
defaultVendors.description: The Bean Counter serves up brewed coffee from the Hawaiian Islands and fulfills your caffeinated desires with a full service espresso bar. Feed your growling stomach with a dizzying array of bagels with homemade spreads, or chow down with our savory wraps, healthy salads and sweet treats.

defaultVendors.name: Da Spot
defaultVendors.description: Da Spot Health Foods & Juices offers diverse, healthy and affordable cuisine with a unique take on tasty dishes from around the world. Da Spot specializes in Mediterranean and North African food with vegan and specialty meat options that can be certified halal or kosher. Offering imaginative cuisine in exotic styles of Egyptian, Greek, French, Italian, Indian, Thai, Malaysian, Ethiopian, American, Hawaiian, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Pacific Rim and fusion cooking.

defaultVendors.name: Dunkin’ Donuts
defaultVendors.description: Dunkin’ Donuts in Paradise Palms Cafe will keep Hawaii running with high-quality beverage offerings–including freshly-brewed Hot and Iced Coffees–paired perfectly with delicious donuts, bakery goods, sandwiches and more.

defaultVendors.name: Holoholo Grill
defaultVendors.description: Holoholo Grill features healthy, locally grown salads, sandwiches, and grab-and-go items at affordable prices. They are committed to using the freshest island-grown ingredients sourced directly from farmers and fishermen. Grab-and-go, breakfast items, or catering for any sized group are also available!

defaultVendors.name: L&L Hawaiian Barbecue
defaultVendors.description: Delicious local and Asian-American fusion cuisine served in big portions at reasonable prices! Try delicious L&L favorites like the Hawaiian Barbecue beef, chicken, or short ribs! Enjoy L&L’s famous fried chicken katsu, the best in town! Grab-and-go, breakfast items and party packs for groups also available.

defaultVendors.name: Lasoon
defaultVendors.description:
Lasoon offers natural home-cooked Nepali and Indian food for everyone. From a $5 bowl options when you are in a hurry to larger plates to please your appetite.

We are focusing on vegan and gluten free meals and offer 4 – 5 options that are changed daily. Besides the vegan options we offer 3 meat options ranging from mild to spicy!

defaultVendors.name: Le Crepe Cafe
defaultVendors.description:
Le Crêpe Café makes traditional French crêpes, cooked to order in front of customers. They specialize in a flavorsome menu of sweet and savory crêpes and use fresh ingredients, organic when possible. Their utensils are even bio-compostable. Enjoy a crêpe any time of day, as a breakfast, snack, main course, or dessert — close your eyes and you’re in Paris!

Whether you’re needing a break from the law books or a pick-me-up as you’re headed to or off campus, you’ll also appreciate Le Crêpe Café’s French Roast and espresso drinks.

defaultVendors.name: Panda Express
defaultVendors.description: Panda Express serves gourmet Chinese food made with only the freshest ingredients. Famous for its Orange Chicken, they also offer a number of Wok Smart entrées that contain less than 250 calories per serving, such as Shanghai Angus Steak, Kung Pao Chicken, and Broccoli Beef. Other favorites include Beijing Beef, Sweetfire Chicken Breast, and Honey Walnut Shrimp.

defaultVendors.name: Ono Seafood
defaultVendors.description: Traditional super ono ahi & tako poke; always fresh, premium ahi — never frozen! Made to order poke by the pound & poke bowls.

defaultVendors.name: Kamitoku Ramen
defaultVendors.description: Kamitoku Ramen specializes in a Tottori-style beef bone ramen.

defaultVendors.name: Hot Tacos
defaultVendors.description: Hot Tacos offers authentic Mexican food, prepped and cooked daily from scratch offering tacos, burritos, and quesadillas with meat options like steak, chicken, marinated pork, and shredded beef. They offer a la carte options or lunch plates that include beans and Spanish rice and other add on options like Chili Rellenos and Tamales.
defaultVendors.location: Kennedy Theatre (Monday), Post (Tuesday), Kuykendall (Wednesday), Architecture (Thursday), and Korean Studies (Friday)

defaultVendors.name: Ba-Le
defaultVendors.description: Pastries, sandwiches, and pre-made salads are some of their quick lunch options. Popular items at Ba-Le include pho, pad thai, and banh mi sandwiches.

defaultVendors.name: Bowlful
defaultVendors.description: The Campus Center Food Court offers a variety of food including plate lunches, bentos, grab-and-go salads and wraps, burgers, and more!

defaultVendors.name: Jamba Juice
defaultVendors.description: Jamba blends real fruit and whole ingredients into each delicious fresh juice, smoothie, or energy bowl you order and contains no artificial colors, preservatives, or flavors.

defaultVendors.name: Pizza Hut
defaultVendors.description: Pizza Hut Express features delicious pizzas ready to go whenever you are. Pizza Hut Express is located near Business Works Hawaii, Inc. on the First Floor of Campus Center.

defaultVendors.name: Simply To Go
defaultVendors.description: Simply to Go Catering features a curated selection of the most popular Simply to Go items all packaged into one easy-to-use boxed solution.

defaultVendors.name: Starbucks
defaultVendors.description: With a full menu, as well as seasonal and specialty items, coffee fanatics are sure to be pleased. Also available are pastries, fruit cups, and bottled beverages for your purchase.

defaultVendors.name: Subway
defaultVendors.description: Your local Honolulu Subway® Restaurant, located at 2465 Campus Rd brings new bold flavors along with old favorites to satisfied guests every day. We deliver these mouth-watering flavors with our famous Footlongs, 6” sandwiches, wraps and salads.

defaultVendors.name: The Burger Shop
defaultVendors.description: The Campus Center Food Court offers a variety of food including plate lunches, bentos, grab-and-go salads and wraps, burgers, and more!

defaultVendors.name: Gateway Cafe
defaultVendors.description: Dine-in is available, please show us your LumiSight UH daily check-in or your vaccination card. You may only remove your mask while actively eating or drinking while seated at a table. Dine-in service ends half an hour before we close.

defaultVendors.name: Hale Aloha Cafe
defaultVendors.description: Hale Aloha Café serves your favorite comfort foods and cuisine influenced by global flavors.

defaultVendors.name: The Market
defaultVendors.description: The Market at Hale Noelani is your on-campus convenience store which offers all your favorite items and basic necessities. Open 7 days a week, you can stock up on snacks, cup noodle, bottled water, toilet paper, bath soap, laundry detergent, and much more at The Market! The Market also offers hot food in a hurry - Pizzas, Chicken Nuggets, Mac & Cheese are a few of the quick bites your can enjoy from this location.

defaultVendors.name: A Place to Eat
defaultVendors.description: Counter-service place offering inventive island-fusion fare, plus catering & cooking classes.

defaultVendors.name: Betty's Burgers
defaultVendors.description: JUICY BURGERS TASTY FRIES THICK SHAKES

defaultVendors.name: Blazin Steaks
defaultVendors.description: Informal counter-serve kitchen dishing out classic Hawaiian plates such as loco moco.

defaultVendors.name: McDonalds
defaultVendors.description: McDonald's is an American multinational fast food corporation, founded in 1940 as a restaurant operated by Richard and Maurice McDonald, in San Bernardino, California, United States.

defaultVendors.name: Nishi Moncho Ramen
defaultVendors.description: Nishi Moncho Ramen Restaurant offers authentic Ramen and delicious tasting Japanese cuisine in Honolulu, HI.

defaultVendors.name: Island Subs & Burgers
defaultVendors.description: Part of a small chain of casual Chinese kitchens specializing in Cantonese-style meat-stuffed buns.

defaultVendors.name: O-Bok Korean Restaurant
defaultVendors.description: Located in the Manoa marketplace, we offer authentic korean dishes like Yukgaejang, Ginseng chicken soup, Kalbi Tang, korean pancakes as well as local favorites.

defaultVendors.name: Waipuna Sushi
defaultVendors.description: Affordable poke, sushi and platters.
